text.0: may varuṇa with guidance straight and mitra lead us he who knows.
text.1: and aryaman in accord with gods.
text.2: for they are dealers forth of wealth and not deluded with their might.
text.4: shelter may they vouchsafe to us immortal gods to mortal men.
text.6: may they mark out our paths to bliss indra the maruts pūṣan.
text.7: and bhaga the gods to be adored.
text.8: yea pūṣan viṣṇu ye who run your course enrich our hymns with kine.
text.10: the winds waft sweets the rivers pour sweets for the man who keeps the law.
text.11: so may the plants be sweet for us.
text.12: sweet be the night and sweet the dawns sweet the terrestrial atmosphere.
text.13: sweet be our father heaven to us.
text.14: may the tall tree be full of sweets for us and full of sweets the sun.
text.15: may our milchkine be sweet for us.
text.16: be mitra gracious unto us and varuṇa and aryaman.
text.17: indra bṛhaspati be kind and viṣṇu of the mighty stride.
